                                                      =
                                                      3.698
                                                      .
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              


                                 Step 3. Calculate the weights 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             w
                                          
                                          
                                             ij
                                          
                                          
                                             k
                                          
                                       
                                       
                                       (
                                       k
                                       =
                                       1
                                       ,
                                       2
                                       ,
                                       …
                                       ,
                                       p
                                       )
                                    
                                  associated with the 2-dimension uncertain linguistic variables 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   r
                                                
                                                
                                                   ˆ
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                          
                                             ij
                                          
                                          
                                             k
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                  based on the formula 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             w
                                          
                                          
                                             ij
                                          
                                          
                                             k
                                          
                                       
                                       =
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   γ
                                                
                                                
                                                   k
                                                
                                             
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      1
                                                      +
                                                      T
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            
                                                               
                                                                  
                                                                     
                                                                        
                                                                           r
                                                                        
                                                                        
                                                                           ˆ
                                                                        
                                                                     
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                     ij
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                     k
                                                                  
                                                               
                                                            
                                                         
                                                      
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                   ∑
                                                
                                                
                                                   k
                                                   =
                                                   1
                                                
                                                
                                                   p
                                                
                                             
                                             
                                                
                                                   γ
                                                
                                                
                                                   k
                                                
                                             
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      1
                                                      +
                                                      T
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            
                                                               
                                                                  
                                                                     
                                                                        
                                                                           r
                                                                        
                                                                        
                                                                           ˆ
                                                                        
                                                                     
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                     ij
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                     k
                                                                  
                                                               
                                                            
                                                         
                                                      
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                
                                                   
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            w
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            11
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            1
                                                         
                                                      
                                                      =
                                                      0.21
                                                      ,
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            w
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            12
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            1
                                                         
                                                      
                                                      =
                                                      0.21
                                                      ,
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            w
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            13
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            1
                                                         
                                                      
                                                      =

                                                            w
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            45
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            5
                                                         
                                                      
                                                      =
                                                      0.20
                                                      .
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              


                                 Step 4. Aggregate the evaluation information of each expert by 2DULPGWA operator based on the following formula (suppose λ
                                 =1):
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             
                                                
                                                
                                                   
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            
                                                               
                                                                  r
                                                               
                                                               
                                                                  ˆ
                                                               
                                                            
                                                         
                                                         
                                                            ij
                                                         
                                                      
                                                      =
                                                      2
                                                      DULPGWA
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            
                                                               
                                                                  
                                                                     
                                                                        
                                                                           r
                                                                        
                                                                        
                                                                           ˆ
                                                                        
                                                                     
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                     ij
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                     1
                                                                  
                                                               
                                                               ,
                                                               
                                                                  
                                                                     
                                                                        
                                                                           r
                                                                        
                                                                        
                                                                           ˆ
                                                                        
                                                                     
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                     ij
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                     2
                                                                  
                                                               
                                                               ,
                                                               …
                                                               ,
                                                               
                                                                  
                                                                     
                                                                        
                                                                           r
                                                                        
                                                                        
                                                                           ˆ
                                                                        
                                                                     
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                     ij
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                     p
                                                                  
                                                               
                                                            
                                                         
                                                      
                                                      =
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            
                                                               
                                                                  
                                                                     
                                                                        
                                                                           
                                                                              
                                                                                 
                                                                                    s
                                                                                 
                                                                                 
                                                                                    ̇
                                                                                 
                                                                              
                                                                           
                                                                           
                                                                              
                                                                                 
                                                                                    
                                                                                       
                                                                                          
                                                                                             
                                                                                                ∑
                                                                                             
                                                                                             
                                                                                                k
                                                                                                =
                                                                                                1
                                                                                             
                                                                                             
                                                                                                p
                                                                                             
                                                                                          
                                                                                       
                                                                                       
                                                                                          
                                                                                             w
                                                                                          
                                                                                          
                                                                                             ij
                                                                                          
                                                                                          
                                                                                             k
                                                                                          
                                                                                       
                                                                                       
                                                                                          
                                                                                             
                                                                                                
                                                                                                   
                                                                                                      
                                                                                                         a
                                                                                                      
                                                                                                      
                                                                                                         ij
                                                                                                      
                                                                                                      
                                                                                                         k
                                                                                                      
                                                                                                   
                                                                                                
                                                                                             
                                                                                          
                                                                                          
                                                                                             λ
                                                                                          
                                                                                       
                                                                                    
                                                                                 
                                                                              
                                                                              
                                                                                 1
                                                                                 /
                                                                                 λ
                                                                              
                                                                           
                                                                        
                                                                        ,
                                                                        
                                                                           
                                                                              
                                                                                 
                                                                                    s
                                                                                 
                                                                                 
                                                                                    ̇
                                                                                 
                                                                              
                                                                           
                                                                           
                                                                              
                                                                                 
                                                                                    
                                                                                       
                                                                                          
                                                                                             
                                                                                                ∑
                                                                                             
                                                                                             
                                                                                                k
                                                                                                =
                                                                                                1
                                                                                             
                                                                                             
                                                                                                p

In actual decision making, according to this evaluation result, Jinan Science and Technology Bureau had decided to fund the enterprise of integrated circuit. To date, this enterprise has produced huge economic and social benefits.

This example is adapted from Liu and Zhang [4]. A practical use of the proposed approach involves the technological innovation ability evaluation of the four enterprises {a
                        1, a
                        2, a
                        3, a
                        4}, the attributes are shown as follows: the ability of innovative resources input (C
                        1), the ability of innovation management (C
                        2), the ability of innovation tendency (C
                        3) and the ability of research and development (C
                        4). Based on the four attributes, the three experts {e
                        1, e
                        2, e
                        3} evaluated the technological innovation ability of the four enterprises. Supposed that γ
                        =(0.4, 0.32, 0.28) is the weight vector of the three experts, and the attribute values given by the experts take the form of 2-demention uncertain linguistic variables, and shown in Tables 6–8
                        
                        
                        . The experts utilize I class linguistic set 
                           
                              
                                 
                                    S
                                 
                                 
                                    I
                                 
                              
                              =
                              (
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          s
                                       
                                       
                                          ̇
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    0
                                 
                              
                              ,
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          s
                                       
                                       
                                          ̇
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    1
                                 
                              
                              ,
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          s
                                       
                                       
                                          ̇
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    2
                                 
                              
                              ,
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          s
                                       
                                       
                                          ̇
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    3
                                 
                              
                              ,
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          s
                                       
                                       
                                          ̇
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    4
                                 
                              
                              ,
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          s
                                       
                                       
                                          ̇
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    5
                                 
                              
                              ,
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          s
                                       
                                       
                                          ̇
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    6
                                 
                              
                              )
                           
                         and the II class linguistic set 
                           
                              
                                 
                                    S
                                 
                                 
                                    II
                                 
                              
                              =
                              (
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          s
                                       
                                       
                                          ¨
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    0
                                 
                              
                              ,
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          s
                                       
                                       
                                          ¨
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    1
                                 
                              
                              ,
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          s
                                       
                                       
                                          ¨
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    2
                                 
                              
                              ,
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          s
                                       
                                       
                                          ¨
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    3
                                 
                              
                              ,
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          s
                                       
                                       
                                          ¨
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    4
                                 
                              
                              )
                           
                         and ω
                        =(0.25, 0.27, 0.25, 0.23) is the attribute weight vector. Please rank the four enterprises based on their technological innovation ability.

Because the attribute weight information is known, we can use the method introduced in Section 5.1. To get the best alternative(s), the following steps are involved:

                        Step 3. Calculate the weights 
                           
                              
                                 
                                    w
                                 
                                 
                                    ij
                                 
                                 
                                    k
                                 
                              
                              
                              (
                              k
                              =
                              1
                              ,
                              2
                              ,
                              …
                              ,
                              p
                              )
                           
                         associated with the 2-dimension uncertain linguistic variables 
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          r
                                       
                                       
                                          ˆ
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    ij
                                 
                                 
                                    k
                                 
                              
                           
                         based on the formula 
                           
                              
                                 
                                    w
                                 
                                 
                                    ij
                                 
                                 
                                    k
                                 
                              
                              =
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          γ
                                       
                                       
                                          k
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             1
                                             +
                                             T
                                             
                                                
                                                   
                                                      
                                                         
                                                            
                                                               
                                                                  r
                                                               
                                                               
                                                                  ˆ

                                                            k
                                                         
                                                      
                                                   
                                                
                                             
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          ∑
                                       
                                       
                                          k
                                          =
                                          1

                         using the method described in Section 3.4.

                        Step 9. Rank all the alternatives and select the best one in accordance with the ranking of 
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          z
                                       
                                       
                                          ˆ
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    i
                                 
                              
                              (
                              i
                              =
                              1
                              ,
                              2
                              ,
                              3
                              ,
                              4
                              )
                           
                        .
                           
                              
                                 E
                                 (
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             z
                                          
                                          
                                             ˆ
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       1
                                    
                                 
                                 )
                                 >
                                 E
                                 (
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             z
                                          
                                          
                                             ˆ
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       2
                                    
                                 
                                 )
                                 >
                                 E
                                 (
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             z
                                          
                                          
                                             ˆ
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       3
                                    
                                 
                                 )
                                 >
                                 E
                                 (
                                 
                                    
                                       
                                          
                                             z
                                          
                                          
                                             ˆ
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    
                                       4
                                    
                                 
                                 )
                                 ,
                                 
                                 thus
                                 
                                 
                                    
                                       a
                                    
                                    
                                       1
                                    
                                 
                                 ≻
                                 
                                    
                                       a
                                    
                                    
                                       2
                                    
                                 
                                 ≻
                                 
                                    
                                       a
                                    
                                    
                                       3
                                    
                                 
                                 ≻
                                 
                                    
                                       a
                                    
                                    
                                       4
                                    
                                 
                                 .
                              
                           
                        
                     

Obviously, this ranking result is the same as that in Liu and Zhang [4]. Comparing with the method proposed by Liu and Zhang [4], the method in this paper has two advantages: one is that II class uncertain linguistic information can be directly involved in operations, and this process method can overcome the shortcomings of information distortion produced in Liu and Zhang [4] in which II class uncertain linguistic information was firstly converted to linguistic variables and then converted to the weight of decision makers; another is that the proposed method can consider the correlations of the aggregated 2-dimension uncertain linguistic variables, and the method proposed by Liu and Zhang [4] did not consider their correlations. Similarly, there exist the shortcomings of information distortion in the methods proposed by references [5,6]. In addition, one advantage of the method proposed by Liu and Zhang [4] is that it can consider the situation of the unknown attribute weight. Obviously, in the processing of II class uncertain linguistic information, the proposed method is better than that by Liu and Zhang [4].

In addition, comparing with the existing aggregation operators, the proposed 2DULPGA and 2DULPGWA operators can process the 2-dimension uncertain linguistic variables and consider the correlations of the aggregated 2-dimension uncertain linguistic variables.

@&#CONCLUSION@&#

The multiple attribute decision making problems based on 2-dimension uncertain linguistic variables have been applied to a wide range of areas. Compared with the traditional uncertain linguistic variables, 2-dimension uncertain linguistic variables add a subjective evaluation on the reliability of the evaluation results given by decision makers, so they can better express fuzzy information. In addition, the PA operator has a prominent characteristic which can take all the decision arguments and their relationships into account. Based on PA operator and 2-dimension uncertain linguistic variables, this paper develops some power generalized aggregation operators based on the 2-dimension uncertain linguistic information, such as 2DULPGA and 2DULPGWA operators, and some desirable properties, such as idempotency, commutativity and boundedness are discussed, at the same time, some special cases are illustrated. Finally, a multi-attribute group decision making method based on the 2-dimension uncertain linguistic power generalized weighted aggregation operator is proposed. In further research, it is necessary and meaningful to give the applications in real decision making, or the proposed operators and methods can be extended to other fuzzy information.

@&#ACKNOWLEDGMENTS@&#

This paper is supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (No. 71271124), the Humanities and Social Sciences Research Project of Ministry of Education of China (No. 13YJC630104), the Natural Science Foundation of Shandong Province (Nos. ZR2013GQ011, ZR2011FM036), Social Science Planning Project of Shandong Province (No. 13BGLJ10), and Graduate Education Innovation Projects in Shandong Province (SDYY12065). The author also would like to express appreciation to the anonymous reviewers and Editor in Chief Prof. Hamido Fujita for their very helpful comments that improved the paper.
